title: 2017 Conspiracy Episode With Hermitage No. 1
itunes:title: 2017 Conspiracy Episode With Hermitage No. 1
description:
It’s easily our most controversial episode of the year as we sit down and create some rumors, spread some rumors and tease you about who may be selling, who may be sold and what the future could hold for the Cigar Industry.

To make things more interesting we will be joined by Eric Hanson of Hammer + Sickle where we will light up the Hermitage No. 1 and Sochi. But it doesn’t stop there as the vodka will be flowing making this a dangerous episode for us and hopefully a funtastic one for you!

Join us as we stare into the crystal ball, see what lies behind the wall and share the wonder of it all.

Join live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss athttp://www.2GuysCigars.com/
